ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron felt the pain race through his body, GALVATRON he screamed out, he knew he was behind it. He went donw to a knee, he then heard Galvatrons thoughts,

Subject: Re: Galvatron?
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron felt the pain race through his body, "GALVATRON" he screamed out,
he knew he was behind it. He went donw to a knee, he then heard Galvatrons
thoughts, of them being one. He almost fell over from the searing pain, his
breathing was hoarse, he grabbed his chest with both hands, and wrenched at
it. "No, no one controls, MEGATRONNNN" he screamed between pained breathes,
he fell to his stomach, twisting and turning in agony, stil grapling his
chest, the pain was emmense, and tearing him apart. "huhhhh, huhhhh, no, I
will not fall", as he spoke he got back to his one knee, still breathing
hard.
